summary: A calm-before-the-storm kind of day. Landed at a transitional threshold — tomorrow marks Day 1 of a new chapter. Emotions were mixed but manageable: ambient anxiety with brief stress spikes, tempered by a rational awareness that things are now moving forward. Relief is present but hasn’t fully sunk in, like background music not yet noticed. Body is still processing the end of a long-wait loop. The mind is scanning ahead while the heart is catching up.

wins: Held emotional awareness throughout the day
losses: Couldn't fully access the feeling of relief
ideas: Set a post-Day-1 ritual to let the nervous system fully transition

goals: Observe the new company quietly and attentively
Identify one key person to learn from
